original_solution_mapping.L1: Jason drives 60 miles per hour * 0.5 hours = <<60*0.5=30>>30 miles initially
original_solution_mapping.L2: He needs to drive an additional 120 miles total - 30 miles driven = <<120-30=90>>90 more miles
original_solution_mapping.L3: He has 1.5 hours - 0.5 hours = <<1.5-0.5=1>>1 hour to drive the remaining distance

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5724.
    Returns: the average speed Jason needs for the remainder of the drive.
    """
    # L1
    initial_speed = 60 # drives at 60 miles per hour
    initial_duration_hours = 0.5 # for 30 minutes
    initial_distance_driven = initial_speed * initial_duration_hours

    # L2
    total_distance = 120 # 120 miles away
    remaining_distance = total_distance - initial_distance_driven

    # L3
    total_time_decimal_hours = 1.5 # in exactly 1 hour 30 minutes
    remaining_time = total_time_decimal_hours - initial_duration_hours

    # L4
    required_average_speed = remaining_distance / remaining_time

    # FA
    answer = required_average_speed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Jason drives {initial_speed} miles per hour * {initial_duration_hours} hours = <<{initial_speed}*{initial_duration_hours}={initial_distance_driven}>>{initial_distance_driven} miles initially

He needs to drive an additional {total_distance} miles total - {initial_distance_driven} miles driven = <<{total_distance}-{initial_distance_driven}={remaining_distance}>>{remaining_distance} more miles

He has {total_time_decimal_hours} hours - {initial_duration_hours} hours = <<{total_time_decimal_hours}-{initial_duration_hours}={remaining_time}>>{remaining_time} hour to drive the remaining distance
He must average {required_average_speed} miles per hour to drive the remaining {remaining_distance} miles in {remaining_time} hour
